  Make large numbers and long numerals easier to read by splitting them up into
  chunks.

Long sequences of digits (e.g. numerals such as phone, serial and credit card numbers) can be difficult for users to read, remember and compare.

A simple and proven way to increase their readability is to split up the digits into visually separated groups:

<Grid2Cols>
  <Example 
    indicator="success" 
    caption="Credit card number with digits grouped"
  >
    5471 3250 0192 1718
  </Example>
  <Example 
    indicator="error" 
    caption="Credit card number without digits grouped"
  >
    5471325001921718
  </Example>
</Grid2Cols>

The symbols for separating the digit groups vary based on tradition and cultural context. Make sure to follow the (local) conventions.

<Grid2Cols>
  <Example 
    indicator="success" 
    caption="Telephone number with digits grouped"
  >
    +1 (800) 322 8316
  </Example>
  <Example 
    indicator="error" 
    caption="Telephone number without digits grouped"
  >
    18003228316
  </Example>
</Grid2Cols>
